name: Flight of the Corona
description:
Entry for Quarantime Jam. Theme: A lot of..

..Cells to infect!

Try to infect as many cells in the victims lungs. Aim with mouse and use left click to bounce the corona virus. 

I wanted to practice cel shading and thought that cells would be an appropriate theme. I used CC0 Sound effects from https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-sound-pack. Everything else is created using Unity, Blender and FL Studio.

This game isn't intended to belittle the seriousness of the Corona virus or make fun of the victims.
